name: Arcade

features.interactive_text: The games here are a little more intense than what Earthlings are used to -- there's one game where you literally live an entire lifetime, and rack up points based on how successfully you live. It's not really much fun.

longform: Blips & Chitz, Morty! It's the *urp* Greatest Arcade in the Multiverse! We're gonna have a ton of fun here!
shortform: Seriously, this place is awesome -- why do we keep leaving and coming back??
